Credits & Tech

Site powered by Jekyll on GitHub Pages, using structure from Jekyll Documentation, and style from Materialize.

By using GFM (GitHub Flavored Markdown), it is super easy to write new docs & pages.

Styles of this site is organized by SASS (Syntactically Awesome Style Sheets). Icons are powered by Font Awesome and Material Icons. Codes in site is syntax highlighted by Highlight.js.

Based on jQuery, this site can have a well interaction for user. The table of contents is combined by jekyll-table-of-contents and Scroll-spy of Materialize.

Material Doc

A Material Designed Jekyll template for documentation site. Using structure from Jekyll Documentation, and style from Materialize.
